attributes.action: Why did the Met use Organised Thugs against Students in the recent peaceful Protests?
attributes.additional_details:
Organised Thugs were used against Students in the Recent Protest. This is absolutely APPAULING and Officially Sanctioned. We call for an immediate enquiry and prosecution of those involved including the Head of the Met.
http://www.davidicke.com/headlines/56123-snatch-squads-caught-on-camera-at-london-student-rally
